title: 06/03/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 06/03/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP Discusses Coach K's decision to retire after next season. It's now known that former Duke player Jon Scheyer will take the reins, but who were some of the other candidates considered. Chris Mannix joins to discuss the Celtics decision to bring in Brad Stevens as President. And Nick Wright of FS1, explains why it would be better for the Lakers to lose in the 1st round than the finals

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP Discusses Coach K's decision to retire after next season. It's now known that former Duke player Jon Scheyer will take the reins, but who were some of the other candidates considered. Chris Mannix joins to discuss the Celtics decision to bring in Brad Stevens as President. And Nick Wright of FS1, explains why it would be better for the Lakers to lose in the 1st round than the finals
